name: Agentwatch
description: Track AI agent sessions on a terminal kanban board with real-time status updates and iTerm2 navigation.
longDescription:
Fires on **7 Claude Code events** (SessionStart, UserPromptSubmit, PreToolUse, PermissionRequest, Stop, TaskCompleted, SessionEnd) to maintain live kanban cards via the `agentwatch` CLI.

- **Dual boards**: global board at `~/.config/agentwatch/` and per-project board at `.agents/agentwatch/`
- **Status flow**: Idle → In Progress → Waiting → PermissionRequest, with auto-cleanup on SessionEnd
- **Tool tracking**: shows current tool and detail (command, file path, pattern) during execution
- **iTerm2 navigation**: saves session IDs so clicking a card jumps to the agent's terminal tab or pane

Cards are named `project/branch`, auto-colored by branch hash. Supports git worktrees. Requires `agentwatch` — install via `brew install twiced-technology-gmbh/tap/agentwatch` or from [GitHub](https://github.com/twiced-technology-gmbh/agentwatch).
